Steak Marinade

basics   beef   make-ahead   marinade   sauce

Makes enough for a 1-1½ lb steak
From Food.com

Total time 30+ min

Prep time 2-10 min | Hands-off time 30+ min |

¼ cup soy sauce 2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce 3 tablespoons minced garlic, from jar is fine 1 teaspoon garlic powder ½ teaspoon onion powder

To make the marinade

Combine all ingredients and and marinate steak for 30 minutes to overnight. The garlic will be stronger the longer you marinade.

Made with love and many mistakes by Sharon Brener.
